home.welcome: Welcome to the IPIP-NEO! Over half a million persons have successfully completed this online inventory since it was first posted on the Internet.

questions.8: Believe in the importance of art.
questions.9: Use others for my own ends.
questions.16: Find it difficult to approach others.
questions.24: Believe that I am better than others.
questions.28: Tend to vote for liberal political candidates.
questions.34: Believe that others have good intentions.
questions.37: Talk to a lot of different people at parties.
questions.38: See beauty in things that others might not notice.
questions.40: Often forget to put things back in their proper place.
questions.46: Am afraid to draw attention to myself.
questions.48: Prefer to stick with things that I know.
questions.50: Do more than what's expected of me.
questions.58: Believe that there is no absolute right or wrong.
questions.59: Feel sympathy for those who are worse off than myself.
questions.70: Leave a mess in my room.
questions.71: Am often down in the dumps.
questions.74: Am indifferent to the feelings of others.
questions.77: Do a lot in my spare time.
questions.80: Do just enough work to get by.
questions.84: Have a high opinion of myself.
questions.86: Feel that I'm unable to deal with things.

questions.95: Know how to get things done.
questions.98: Do not enjoy going to art museums.

questions.195: Have a good word for everyone.

questions.212: Set high standards for myself and others.

questions.217: Like to act on a whim.
questions.218: Am relaxed most of the time.

questions.227: Am not easily affected by my emotions.
questions.230: Don't like the idea of change.

questions.236: Believe in an eye for an eye.
questions.237: Am not easily disturbed by events.
questions.238: Do not have a good imagination.
